problem_text_cn: 如图,在高出海平面100米的悬崖顶A处,观测海平面上一艘小船B,并测得它的俯角为45°,则船与观测者之间的水平距离BC=()米．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, at the cliff top A above sea level N_0, observe a boat B on sea level, and measure its depression angle as N_1, then the horizontal distance between the ship and the observer BC = ().
